Events.Text: Say hello and ask for directions (see left panel). [instruction 1 of 4]
Hello, I need directions.
What is your departure location?
Where are you departing from?
I'll be leaving from 5th and Main.
Where are you going to?
Where do you need to go?
I need to go to the airport. Got to go on a trip to visit my friend.
If you haven't yet, start a game of trivia with the assistant while you're getting directions (see left panel). [instruction 2 of 4]
What is your mode of transportation?
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
I'll drive. I am excited about my new car.
When do you plan to depart?
When are you going to start your trip?
Right now. 10 pm.

After 3 kilometers, turn right on Commercial Drive at the subway station.
Drive for 3 blocks. You will pass a hospital on your right. Your destination will be on the left opposite the park.

Scenario.UserTask:
You want directions from '5th and Main' to 'Airport', leaving now (10 pm). As the assistant gives you the directions, alternate randomly between (i) asking for the next instruction, (ii) asking for more details, and (iii) asking for the next trivia question (start at question 3)

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Giving trip directions
- Playing trivia
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Assume:

- Today is Monday the 16th, 10 pm

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
